mapper.insert: insert into replyBoard(re_no, no, userid, content) values(reply_sq.nextval, #{no}, #{userid}, #{content})
mapper.select: select re_no, userid, content, writedate from replyBoard where no=#{no} order by re_no desc
mapper.update: update replyBoard set content=#{content} where re_no=#{re_no} and userid=#{userid}
